item.title: Quebec is One of the World's Most Privileged Postcolonial Societies, Like Scotland if it Still Spoke Gaelic but Were a Well-Off as the Swiss.
item.description: Quebec is One of the World’s Most Privileged Postcolonial Societies, Like Scotland if it Still Spoke Gaelic but Were a Well-Off as the Swiss.
